verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> had-da-Var The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah came אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> me-'Et יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; from the LORD בִּימֵ֨י <WH3117> bi-Mei in the days יְהוֹיָקִ֧ים <WH3079> ye-ho-ya-Kim of Jehoiakim בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יֹאשִׁיָּ֛הוּ <WH2977> yo-shi-Ya-hu of Josiah מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

הָלוֹךְ֮ <WH1980> ha-loCh Go אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit unto the house הָרֵכָבִים֒ <WH7397> ha-re-cha-Vim of the Rechabites וְדִבַּרְתָּ֣ <WH1696> ve-dib-bar-Ta and speak אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> o-Tam, וַהֲבִֽאוֹתָם֙ <WH935> va-ha-vi-'o-Tam unto them and bring בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into אַחַ֖ת <WH259> 'a-Chat into one הַלְּשָׁכ֑וֹת <WH3957> hal-le-sha-Chot; of the chambers וְהִשְׁקִיתָ֥ <WH8248> ve-hish-ki-Ta to drink אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> o-Tam יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> Ya-yin. and give them wine

וָאֶקַּ֞ח <WH3947> va-'ek-Kach Then I took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יַאֲזַנְיָ֤ה <WH2970> ya-'a-zan-Yah Jaazaniah בֶֽן־ <WH1121> ven- the son יִרְמְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu of Jeremiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son חֲבַצִּנְיָ֔ה <WH2262> cha-vatz-tzin-Yah, of Habaziniah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et אֶחָ֖יו <WH251> 'e-Chav and his brethren וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> ba-Nav; and all his sons וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and the whole בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit and the whole house הָרֵכָבִֽים׃ <WH7397> ha-re-cha-Vim. of the Rechabites

וָאָבִ֤א <WH935> va-'a-Vi And I brought אֹתָם֙ <WH853> 'o-Tam בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit them into the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into לִשְׁכַּ֗ת <WH3957> lish-Kat, into the chamber בְּנֵ֛י <WH1121> be-Nei of the sons חָנָ֥ן <WH2605> cha-Nan of Hanan בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יִגְדַּלְיָ֖הוּ <WH3012> yig-dal-Ya-hu of Igdaliah אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish a man הָאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> ha-'E-lo-Him; of God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which אֵ֙צֶל֙ <WH681> 'e-tzel which [was] by לִשְׁכַּ֣ת <WH3957> lish-Kat the chamber הַשָּׂרִ֔ים <WH8269> has-sa-Rim, of the princes אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which מִמַּ֗עַל <WH4605> mi-Ma-'al, which [was] above לְלִשְׁכַּ֛ת <WH3957> le-lish-Kat the chamber מַעֲשֵׂיָ֥הוּ <WH4641> ma-'a-se-Ya-hu of Maaseiah בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- the son שַׁלֻּ֖ם <WH7967> shal-Lum of Shallum שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> sho-Mer the keeper הַסַּֽף׃ <WH5592> has-Saf. of the door

וָאֶתֵּ֞ן <WH5414> va-'et-Ten And I set לִפְנֵ֣י׀ <WH6440> lif-Nei before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei the sons בֵית־ <WH1004> veit- of the house הָרֵכָבִ֗ים <WH7397> ha-re-cha-Vim, of the Rechabites גְּבִעִ֛ים <WH1375> ge-vi-'Im pots מְלֵאִ֥ים <WH4392> me-le-'Im full יַ֖יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin of wine וְכֹס֑וֹת <WH3563> ve-cho-Sot; and cups וָאֹמַ֥ר <WH559> va-'o-Mar and I said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem to שְׁתוּ־ <WH8354> she-tu- unto them Drink יָֽיִן׃ <WH3196> Ya-yin. ye wine

וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru But they said לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo We will not נִשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> nish-teh- We will drink יָּ֑יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin; no wine כִּי֩ <WH3588> ki for יוֹנָדָ֨ב <WH3122> yo-na-Dav for Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רֵכָ֜ב <WH7394> re-Chav of Rechab אָבִ֗ינוּ <WH1> 'a-Vi-nu, our father צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-nu and לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> le-Mor, us saying לֹ֧א <WH3808> lo shall not תִשְׁתּוּ־ <WH8354> tish-tu- Ye shall drink יַ֛יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin no wine אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> 'at-Tem you וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Chem [neither ye] nor your sons עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> o-Lam. ever

וּבַ֣יִת <WH1004> u-Va-yit house לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִבְנ֗וּ <WH1129> tiv-Nu, Neither shall ye build וְזֶ֤רַע <WH2233> ve-Ze-ra' seed לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִזְרָ֙עוּ֙ <WH2232> tiz-Ra-'u nor sow וְכֶ֣רֶם <WH3754> ve-Che-rem vineyard לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תִטָּ֔עוּ <WH5193> tit-Ta-'u, nor plant וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo or יִֽהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh own לָכֶ֑ם la-Chem; כִּ֠י <WH3588> ki in בָּאֳהָלִ֤ים <WH168> bo-'o-ha-Lim in tents תֵּֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> te-she-Vu ye shall dwell כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יְמֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3117> ye-mei-Chem, nor have [any] but all your days לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an that תִּֽחְי֜וּ <WH2421> tich-Yu that ye may live יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> ya-Mim days רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> rab-Bim many עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei in הָאֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah, the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> 'at-Tem where גָּרִ֥ים <WH1481> ga-Rim where ye [be] strangers שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. We

וַנִּשְׁמַ֗ע <WH8085> van-nish-Ma', Thus have we obeyed בְּק֨וֹל <WH6963> be-Kol the voice יְהוֹנָדָ֤ב <WH3082> ye-ho-na-Dav of Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רֵכָב֙ <WH7394> re-Chav of Rechab אָבִ֔ינוּ <WH1> 'a-Vi-nu, our father לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> le-Chol all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher he צִוָּ֑נוּ <WH6680> tziv-Va-nu; in all that he hath charged לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not שְׁתֽוֹת־ <WH8354> she-tot- us to drink יַ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> ya-yin no wine כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all יָמֵ֔ינוּ <WH3117> ya-Mei-nu, all our days אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> 'a-Nach-nu we נָשֵׁ֔ינוּ <WH802> na-Shei-nu, we our wives בָּנֵ֖ינוּ <WH1121> ba-Nei-nu our sons וּבְנֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <WH1323> u-ve-no-Tei-nu. nor our daughters

וּלְבִלְתִּ֛י <WH1115> u-le-vil-Ti nor בְּנ֥וֹת <WH1129> be-Not Nor to build בָּתִּ֖ים <WH1004> bat-Tim houses לְשִׁבְתֵּ֑נוּ <WH3427> le-shiv-Te-nu; for us to dwell in וְכֶ֧רֶם <WH3754> ve-Che-rem neither have we vineyard וְשָׂדֶ֛ה <WH7704> ve-sa-Deh nor field וָזֶ֖רַע <WH2233> va-Ze-ra' nor seed לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo not יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> yih-yeh- have לָּֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> van-Ne-shev But we have dwelt in בָּֽאֳהָלִ֑ים <WH168> bo-'o-ha-Lim; tents וַנִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> van-nish-Ma' and have obeyed וַנַּ֔עַשׂ <WH6213> van-Na-'as, and done כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּ֖נוּ <WH6680> tziv-Va-nu commanded יוֹנָדָ֥ב <WH3122> yo-na-Dav according to all that Jonadab אָבִֽינוּ׃ <WH1> 'a-Vi-nu. our father

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become בַּעֲל֨וֹת <WH5927> ba-'a-Lot came up נְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֥ר <WH5019> ne-vu-chad-retz-Tzar But it came to pass when Nebuchadrezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Me-lech- king בָּבֶל֮ <WH894> ba-Vel of Babylon אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- against הָאָרֶץ֒ <WH776> ha-'a-Retz into the land וַנֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> van-No-mer, that we said בֹּ֚אוּ <WH935> Bo-'u Come וְנָב֣וֹא <WH935> ve-na-Vo and let us go יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, to Jerusalem מִפְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei for fear חֵ֣יל <WH2428> cheil of the army הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> hak-kas-Dim, of the Chaldeans וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> u-mip-pe-Nei and for fear חֵ֣יל <WH2428> cheil of the army אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> 'a-Ram; of the Syrians וַנֵּ֖שֶׁב <WH3427> van-Ne-shev so we dwell בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim. at Jerusalem פ Peh

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- Then came the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> yir-me-Ya-hu unto Jeremiah לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> tze-va-'Ot of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הָלֹ֤ךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch Go וְאָֽמַרְתָּ֙ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and tell לְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> le-'Ish the men יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וּלְיֽוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> u-le-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem הֲל֨וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo not תִקְח֥וּ <WH3947> tik-Chu Will ye not receive מוּסָ֛ר <WH4148> mu-Sar instruction לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> lish-Mo-a' to hearken אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about דְּבָרַ֖י <WH1697> de-va-Rai act נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. God

הוּקַ֡ם <WH6965> hu-Kam are performed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> div-Rei The words יְהוֹנָדָ֣ב <WH3082> ye-ho-na-Dav of Jonadab בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son רֵ֠כָב <WH7394> re-cho of Rechab אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֨ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah that he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בָּנָ֜יו <WH1121> ba-Nav his sons לְבִלְתִּ֣י <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not שְׁתֽוֹת־ <WH8354> she-tot- not to drink יַ֗יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin, wine וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not שָׁתוּ֙ <WH8354> sha-Tu they drink עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against הַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> hai-Yom for unto this day הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> haz-Zeh, this כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for שָֽׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U, none but obey אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et מִצְוַ֣ת <WH4687> mitz-Vat commandment אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vi-Hem; their father's וְאָ֨נֹכִ֜י <WH595> ve-'A-no-Chi I דִּבַּ֤רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti notwithstanding I have spoken אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem to you הַשְׁכֵּ֣ם <WH7925> hash-Kem unto you rising early וְדַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> ve-dab-Ber, and speaking וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> she-ma'-Tem but ye hearkened אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. to

וָאֶשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> va-'esh-Lach I have sent אֲלֵיכֶ֣ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Chem about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all עֲבָדַ֣י <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai also unto you all my servants הַנְּבִאִ֣ים׀ <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֣ים <WH7925> hash-Keim rising up early וְשָׁלֹ֣חַ׀ <WH7971> ve-sha-Lo-ach and sending לֵאמֹ֡ר <WH559> le-Mor [them] saying שֻׁבוּ־ <WH7725> shu-vu- Return נָ֡א <WH4994> na now אִישׁ֩ <WH376> 'ish ye now every man מִדַּרְכּ֨וֹ <WH1870> mid-dar-Ko way הָרָעָ֜ה <WH7451> ha-ra-'Ah from his evil וְהֵיטִ֣יבוּ <WH3190> ve-hei-Ti-vu and amend מַֽעַלְלֵיכֶ֗ם <WH4611> ma-'al-lei-Chem, your doings וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תֵּ֨לְכ֜וּ <WH1980> te-le-Chu go אַחֲרֵ֨י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei not after אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <WH312> 'a-che-Rim other לְעָבְדָ֔ם <WH5647> le-'a-ve-Dam, to serve וּשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> u-she-Vu them and ye shall dwell in אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- in הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> ha-'a-da-Mah, the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti which I have given לָכֶ֖ם <WH99999> la-Chem וְלַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> ve-la-'a-vo-tei-Chem; to you and to your fathers וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo have not הִטִּיתֶם֙ <WH5186> hit-ti-Tem but ye have not inclined אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אָזְנְכֶ֔ם <WH241> 'a-ze-ne-Chem, your ear וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo or שְׁמַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH8085> she-ma'-Tem nor hearkened אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. about
